section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:graphics._BBoxpieces.Bishop
Stores properities of Bishop, inherits form Piece class buttons.Button
Abstarct class for all buttons the inherit from graphics.Circlegraphics.Entrygame.Game
Main class handling gameplay, user interactions and graphic events graphics.GraphicsError
Module Exceptions graphics.GraphicsObjectgraphics.GraphWin
Graphics classes start here graphics.Imagepieces.King
Stores properities of King, inherits form Piece class pieces.Knight
Stores properities of Knight, inherits form Piece class graphics.LineMove.Move
Used to display avalible moves that will be represented as dots on a board buttons.nextButton
Button used the undo the position by one move graphics.Ovalpieces.Pawn
Stores properities of Pawn, inherits form Piece class pieces.Piece
Abstract class, where from every piece class inherits graphics.Pointgraphics.Polygonbuttons.prevButton
Button used the forward the position by one move pieces.Queen
Stores properities of Queen, inherits form Bishop and Rook class graphics.Rectanglebuttons.RestorePosition
Button used the restore the position pieces.Rook
Stores properities of Rook, inherits form Piece class graphics.Textgraphics.Transform
